# keychainReference

**Instance Property**

A persistent reference to the key in the keychain.

## Declaration

```swift
var keychainReference: Data { get }
```

## Discussion

The keychain item needs to have the class [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Security/kSecClassGenericPassword].

## Accessing the configuration parameters

- **identifier**: The identifier for the PPK.
- **isMandatory**: A Boolean value that indicates whether it’s mandatory for the VPN server to use this PPK.
